channel.title: BST02: Using R for Statistics in Medical Research

item.title: BST02: Using R for Statistics in Medical Research
item.description: input.MyButton { padding: 0px 5px; cursor: pointer; font-weight: bold; background: #fff; color: #485167; border-radius: 5px; border: 1px solid #485167; font-size: 100%; } input.MyButton:hover { color: #fff; background: #485167; border: 1px solid #485167; } This website contains materials for the NIHES course Using R for Statistics in Clinical Research (BST02): lecture slides demos of R functions and syntax practicals Download a .zip file with all materials To download and install R, go to https://cran.

item.title: About
item.description: Dr. Eleni-Rosalina Andrinopoulou Dr. Nicole Erler Assistant Professor Postdoctoral Researcher Department of Biostatistics Department of Biostatistics Erasmus Medical Center Erasmus Medical Center Rotterdam, The Netherlands Rotterdam, The Netherlands
